title: DaVinci Twin/Full Size Bed Conversion Kit (M4799) in White
features: NOTE: THESE RAILS WILL CONVERT YOUR FULL-SIZE CRIB INTO A FULL-SIZE BED OR YOUR MINI CRIB INTO A TWIN-SIZE BED
Made of 100% sustainable New Zealand pine wood
Finished in non-toxic multi-step painting process, lead and phthalate safe
Sold Separately: Twin/Full-size bed mattress and box spring
description: Let baby grow up with us! Convert your crib into a full-size bed or your mini crib into a twin-size bed with these wooden bed rails.

Also with your Annabelle Mini Crib (M5998), Emily Mini Crib (M4798), Kalani Mini Crib (M5598), Kalani Crib and Changer (M5591), or Elizabeth II Toddler Bed (M0810).
